resources.string: When your phone is lost or stolen you will be able to use someone else's phone to retrieve the GPS coordinates at your phone's location to help you find it via a SMS with special format.
I've entered "123456" as default for the verify code. Now you can send a text message with "LOCATE:123456" as the body of the text as shown below:
You can change the Verify Code into anything you would not forgot via clicking button above
A Useful Android App - Phone Finder
